org.modelio.api.diagram

Interface IDiagramCustomizer


  • public interface IDiagramCustomizer
    This interface is used to define a diagram palette for a module.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillPalette(org.eclipse.gef.palette.PaletteRoot paletteRoot)
      Define the palette content by adding groups and tools in it.
      Tools can be custom (i.e.
      boolean keepBasePalette()
      Indicates whether the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept or flushed when opening this stereotyped diagram.

    • Method Detail

      • keepBasePalette

        boolean keepBasePalette()
        Indicates whether the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept or flushed when opening this stereotyped diagram.
        Returns:
        true when the 'standard' content of the diagram palette must be kept.

      • fillPalette

        void fillPalette(org.eclipse.gef.palette.PaletteRoot paletteRoot)
        Define the palette content by adding groups and tools in it.
        Tools can be custom (i.e. added by modules) or standard tools, usually named after their metaclass (like 'CREATE_NOTE').
        Parameters:
        root - The root PaletteEntry for the palette model.
